entry.title: Ravaged Launch Trailer [HD]
entry.content: Ravaged is a first person shooter online multiplayer game set upon a post-apocalyptic earth devastated by natural disasters caused by the sun's solar flares. It chronicles the struggle between the "Resistance" and the "Scavengers" as they fight one another in order to gain an upper hand in an ongoing war for survival, territory and resources. Developer: 2Dawn Games Release: 10/17/2012 Genre: FPS Platform: PC Publisher: Reverb Publishing Website: www.2dawn.com FOR MACHINIMA'S BEST HIGH QUALITY SERIES, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MACHINIMA, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE SPORTS GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MMO & RPG GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE COMPETITIVE GAMING, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE ANIMATIONS & SHORTS, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE TRAILERS, GO TO: www.youtube.com

entry.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3 Gameplay Trailer [HD]
entry.content: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 3 will feature the most extensive character roster of any game so far in the series, letting fans engage with a huge number of their favorite personalities from the NARUTO SHIPPUDEN universe, be they friend or foe. In story mode, players will be thrown into a series of thrilling adventures set in the village of Konoha, while the game's electrifying fights will be punctuated with massive scale boss battles, including a fearsome confrontation with the gargantuan Nine-Tails. Release: 2013 Genre: Fighting Platform: PS3/X360 Publisher: Namco Bandai Website: www.namcobandaigames.com FOR MACHINIMA'S BEST HIGH QUALITY SERIES, GO TO www.youtube.com FOR MORE MACHINIMA, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE SPORTS GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MMO & RPG GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE COMPETITIVE GAMING, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE ANIMATIONS & SHORTS, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE TRAILERS, GO TO: www.youtube.com

entry.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 Launch Trailer [HD]
entry.content: Call of Duty: Black Ops II catapults players forward into an epic near-future warzone rooted in today's headlines. The title represents an unprecedented leap for the franchise, delivering a groundbreaking single-player campaign with branching storylines, advanced weaponry, new graphics technology, a deep multiplayer experience featuring a greater emphasis on eSports and match customization, and the most expansive Zombies action yet, now running on the multiplayer engine. Developer: Treyarch Release: 11/13/2012 Genre: FPS Platform: PS3/X360 Publisher: Activision Website: www.callofduty.com FOR MACHINIMA'S BEST HIGH QUALITY SERIES, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MACHINIMA, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE SPORTS GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MMO & RPG GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE COMPETITIVE GAMING, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE ANIMATIONS & SHORTS, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE TRAILERS, GO TO: www.youtube.com

entry.title: Assassins Creed 3 Multiplayer Trailer [HD]
entry.content: Set against the backdrop of the American Revolution in the late 18th century, Assassin's Creed III introduces a new hero, Ratohnhaké:ton, of Native American and English heritage. Adopting the name Connor, he becomes the new voice for justice in the ancient war between the Assassins and Templars. Players become an Assassin in the war for liberty against ruthless tyranny in the most stylized and fluid combat experiences in the franchise to date. Assassin's Creed III spans the Revolutionary War, taking gamers from the vibrant, untamed frontier to bustling colonial towns and the intense, chaotic battlefields where George Washington's Continental Army clashed with the imposing British Army. Developer: Ubisoft Release: 10/30/2012 Genre: Action/ Adventure Platform: PS3/X360/PC Publisher: Ubisoft Website: www.assassinscreed.com FOR MACHINIMA'S BEST HIGH QUALITY SERIES, GO TO www.youtube.com FOR MORE MACHINIMA, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE SPORTS GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MMO & RPG GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE COMPETITIVE GAMING, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE ANIMATIONS & SHORTS, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE TRAILERS, GO TO: www.youtube.com

entry.title: James Bond: 007 Legends Launch Trailer [HD]
entry.content: A first-of-its-kind Bond video game, 007 Legends features an original, overarching storyline featuring six classic Bond movies to offer the most diverse Bond gaming experience yet! As with the feature films, 007 Legends equips players with state-of-the-art spy gadgets, an arsenal of weapons, including Bond's signature Walther PPK, and sleek vehicles as they jet off to exotic locations and utilize Bond's quick wits, class and style to take down notorious villains and their brutal henchmen, perform impressive stunts, and of course...gorgeous Bond women. Developer: Eurocom Release: 10/16/2012 Genre: FPS Platform: PS3/X360/PC Publisher: Activision Website: www.007Legends.com FOR MACHINIMA'S BEST HIGH QUALITY SERIES, GO TO www.youtube.com FOR MORE MACHINIMA, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE SPORTS GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MMO & RPG GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE COMPETITIVE GAMING, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE ANIMATIONS & SHORTS, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE TRAILERS, GO TO: www.youtube.com

entry.title: Doom 3: BFG Edition Launch Trailer [HD]
entry.content: Re-mastered for Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3, this genre defining game and its add-on pack offers greatly enhanced graphics, deeply immersing the player in the demonic world of this terrifying horror masterpiece. Players will also experience a never-before-seen single-player story, 'The Lost Mission' featuring seven heart-pounding levels that will once again have them on the edge of their seats. entry.title: Borderlands 2: Captain Scarlett and Her Pirates Booty Launch Trailer [HD]
entry.content: Borderlands 2 features all-new characters; skills; imaginative, diverse new environments with unique missions and enemies, and more exciting and fun weapons, equipment and loot than ever before. All of these features come together in a story that takes players to the world of Pandora to take down the notorious Handsome Jack and his corrupt Hyperion Corporation as a solo campaign or with up to four cooperative players. entry.title: The Walking Dead - Planet of the Apps
entry.content: www.youtube.com Click here to watch Sugar Kid - Planet of the Apps The Walking Dead - Planet of the Apps The Walking Dead shambles back onto television this week, so we've decided to visit Telltale Games' episodic The Walking Dead for iOS devices. Mirroring the console / PC release, this horror adventure has you trying to survive the undead as Lee Everett, a man heading to prison for the murder of his wife's lover. But since nothing is ever hunky dory in zombie-town, there's a horrific car wreck, and Lee gets attacked by his deputy driver, who is now a zombie. That figures. Things go downhill from there, with Lee teaming up with a young girl named Clementine as they fight for their survival. Using the comic book as canon, the art style and writing go hand in hand with the work of Robert Kirkman and Charlie Adlard, and with four more episodes to come, there's a lot of The Walking Dead to enjoy. iTunes download link: bit.ly How to play The Walking Dead How to to kill zombies in The Walking Dead How to unlock new episodes in The Walking Dead - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - FOR MACHINIMA'S BEST HIGH QUALITY SERIES, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MACHINIMA, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE SPORTS GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MMO & RPG GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE COMPETITIVE GAMING, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE ANIMATIONS & SHORTS, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE ...

entry.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 Elite is Free Trailer [HD]
entry.content: Call of Duty: Black Ops II catapults players forward into an epic near-future warzone rooted in today's headlines. The title represents an unprecedented leap for the franchise, delivering a groundbreaking single-player campaign with branching storylines, advanced weaponry, new graphics technology, a deep multiplayer experience featuring a greater emphasis on eSports and match customization, and the most expansive Zombies action yet, now running on the multiplayer engine. Developer: Treyarch Release: 11/13/2012 Genre: FPS Platform: PS3/X360 Publisher: Activision Website: www.callofduty.com FOR MACHINIMA'S BEST HIGH QUALITY SERIES, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MACHINIMA, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE SPORTS GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MMO & RPG GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE COMPETITIVE GAMING, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE ANIMATIONS & SHORTS, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE TRAILERS, GO TO: www.youtube.com

entry.title: DMC - Devil May Cry NYCC 2012 Trailer [HD]
entry.content: Set against a contemporary backdrop, DmC -- Devil May Cry depicts a duplicitous world where nothing is ever as it seems and the line between good and evil is constantly blurred. Spurred into action by the promises of a trusted relation, Dante bursts into this world intent on revenge at any cost. DmC -- Devil May Cry retains the series' signature mix of sword and gunplay as players encounter a devilish mix of enemies and navigate the rich, interactive environment. Developer: Capcom Release: 1/15/2013 Genre: Action Platform: PS3/X360 Publisher: Capcom Website: devilmaycry.com FOR MACHINIMA'S BEST HIGH QUALITY SERIES, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MACHINIMA, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE SPORTS GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MMO & RPG GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE COMPETITIVE GAMING, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE ANIMATIONS & SHORTS, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE TRAILERS, GO TO: www.youtube.com

entry.title: Deadpool -- Deadpool Does Comic Con [HD]
entry.content: Hey suits, listen up 'cause I've got some pretty sweet news to break. I, DEADPOOL, today announced that I've... (ahem...we've) ...yes, right...WE'VE decided to make a kick-butt, butt-kicking new video game based on the awesome-ing-ist Super Hero ever known to man ...(and woman, if you know what we're sayin') -- starring yours truly, ME -- DEADPOOL. I know, I know...I pee'd myself a little with excitement just now too (you call that 'a little?'). Developer: High Moon Release: 2013 Genre: Action Platform: PS3/X360 Publisher: Activision Website: www.deadpoolgame.com FOR MACHINIMA'S BEST HIGH QUALITY SERIES, GO TO www.youtube.com FOR MORE MACHINIMA, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE SPORTS GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MMO & RPG GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE COMPETITIVE GAMING, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE ANIMATIONS & SHORTS, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE TRAILERS, GO TO: www.youtube.com

entry.title: Silent Hill: Anniversary (Silent Hill Fan Film)
entry.content: youtu.be Click here to watch Silent Hill: Anniversary Official Trailer SILENT HILL: ANNIVERSARY (Fan Film) After receiving a letter from his deceased wife, James Sunderland is drawn to the mysterious town of Silent Hill. The possessed town is where the couple spent their anniversary and deemed it their "special place". James searches in hopes to find answers while encountering supernatural events, characters, and creatures that are a direct reflection of his inner personal and disturbing psyche. A Jay Ness Film/Lon Lon Studios Production Please visit the following URL to learn more: jay-ness.com DIRECTOR'S CHANNEL www.youtube.com Machinima Happy Hour is home to the best animation and shorts Machinima has to offer. Check back every weekend for updates on all your favorite shows like Sanity Not Included, Two Best Friends Play, Freeman's Mind, Sonic For Hire and more! www.youtube.com - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - FOR MACHINIMA'S BEST HIGH QUALITY SERIES, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MACHINIMA, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE SPORTS GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MMO & RPG GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE COMPETITIVE GAMING, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE ANIMATIONS & SHORTS, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE TRAILERS, GO TO: www.youtube.com
